DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) safety tolerability etanercept , 25 50 mg , administer single dose healthy male Chinese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Enbrel Drug Levels Healthy Male Chinese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Chinese subject , age 18 45 . BMI range 18 30 kg/m2 weight great equal 50 kg . Active tuberculosis ( TB ) history TB . Serious infection ( associate hospitalization and/or antibiotic ) within 1 month study drug administration . History protein drug hypersensitivity .
